==Trivia==
* Giga Excalibur, along with {{Wt|Vassal's Blade}}, which came out at the same time, are the first weapons to come out that may give a damage bonus if {{St|Phantom Spd}} is equipped.
* The Japanese name for this weapon, Gigascalibur, has the same name as the S-rank Anima tome featured in the Japanese version of {{FE|7}}, the localized version of the game using the name Excalibur.
